attributes.action: The UK Government & alliance to take any action to stop ALL hostilities in Syria
attributes.additional_details: Self explanatory and well covered by the media.
attributes.background: The war in Syria is tantamount to ethnic cleansing, in equality of arms,  outside forces, genocide and war crimes. innocent people and helpless children are being killed through the use of chemical weapons; in contravention of the UN and Geneva conventions. Blatant disregard of Human Rights.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
